long_description: The SRAM PC1071 10-speed chain uses HollowPin(TM) construction for uncompromised performance, strength and light weight. Compatibility extends to industry-standard 10-speed systems. PC1071 chain is linked together using the easy-to-use, tool-free PowerLock(TM) connecting pin. Note: PowerLock(TM) connecting pin can not be reused once it is locked in place.
short_description: The SRAM PC1071 10-speed chain uses HollowPin(TM) construction for uncompromised performance, strength and light weight.
